subject: Baseball
Apparel
Steroids
Human Growth Hormone
lead_paragraph: A T-shirt with Roger Clemens’s name, the No. 22 on the back and the question “Got Rocket Fuel?” has taken on an unintended connotation since Clemens, known as the Rocket, was linked to steroid use.
snippet: A T-shirt with Roger Clemens’s name, the No. 22 on the back and the question “Got Rocket Fuel?” has taken on an unintended connotation since Clemens, known as the Rocket, was linked to steroid use.
